Footer.about: We specialize in importing quality cars from America

HomePage.pageTitle: AutoAmerika - Selling cars that come from America
HomePage.pageDescription: We specialize in importing quality cars from America

HeroSection.title: We are selling
HeroSection.subtitle: the best american cars
HeroSection.description: Od kupovine do registracije - kompletna usluga uvoza vozila iz Amerike

CarTypesSection.title: Discover Your Dream Car
CarTypesSection.description: Explore our curated collection of premium vehicles across all categories

CarBrandsSection.title: Premium Automotive Brands
CarBrandsSection.description: Discover iconic manufacturers known for excellence and innovation

WhyUsSection.title: Why AutoAmerika?
WhyUsSection.description: Years of experience in importing cars from America
WhyUsSection.provenQualityDescription: Every car goes through a detailed inspection before import
WhyUsSection.fastProcedureDescription: We offer fast delivery to your doorstep
WhyUsSection.transparentPricesDescription: We accept all major credit cards and cryptocurrencies

CtaSection.title: Are you ready for your new car?
CtaSection.description: Contact us today and start the process of importing your ideal vehicle

AboutPage.pageDescription: Learn about AutoAmerika, your trusted partner for importing quality American cars. Over 10 years of experience in complete vehicle import services.

HeroSection.title: About Us
HeroSection.subtitle: Your trusted partner for importing luxury American cars

IntroductionSection.title: Our Story
IntroductionSection.paragraph1: With over 10 years of experience in importing cars from America, we have specialized in providing complete service to our clients. From finding the perfect vehicle to its registration in Serbia, we take care of every detail.
IntroductionSection.paragraph2: Our team of experts has deep knowledge of the American car market and provides personalized service that guarantees you will get a vehicle that fully meets your needs and expectations.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We guarantee transparency and security in every transaction

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: A team with years of experience in the automotive industry

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Efficient import process with clear delivery deadlines

completeService.title: Complete Service
completeService.description: From purchase to registration - everything in one place

step1.title: Finding the Vehicle
step1.description: We help you find the perfect vehicle at American auctions and dealerships

step2.title: Purchase and Transport
step2.description: We handle the purchase and organize safe transport of the vehicle to Serbia

step3.title: Customs and Registration
step3.description: We take care of all formalities and hand over the vehicle ready to drive

CtaSection.title: Ready to import your dream car?
CtaSection.description: Contact us today and start the journey to your new vehicle

ContactPage.pageDescription: Get in touch with AutoAmerika for American car import inquiries. We're here to help you find and import your dream vehicle.

HeroSection.title: Contact Us
HeroSection.description: Have questions? We're happy to help. Contact us via the form or directly.

ContactForm.title: Send Us a Message
ContactForm.validationError: Please fill in all required fields correctly

LoginPage.pageDescription: Log in to the AutoAmerika platform to access exclusive cars from America.

Card.title: Welcome

CarsPage.pageDescription: Browse our selection of quality American cars. Filter by brand, price, year and other characteristics.

ReviewsPage.pageDescription: Read reviews from our satisfied customers about importing American cars through AutoAmerika. Real experiences from verified buyers.

CarPage.pageDescription: Car details. Contact us for more information.

AddCarHeader.description: Enter all necessary information about the car you are importing

AdminDashboardPage.pageDescription: Manage your vehicle inventory and track imports. AutoAmerika admin dashboard for car dealers.

AdminDashboardCurrentCarsHeader.title: Current Cars ({count})
AdminDashboardCurrentCarsHeader.searchPlaceholder: Search by brand, model or VIN...

AdminDashboardCurrentCarsEmpty.title: No cars available
AdminDashboardCurrentCarsEmpty.description: You haven't added any cars to your inventory yet. Start building your collection by adding your first vehicle.

EditCarPage.pageDescription: Edit vehicle information, specifications, and photos. Admin panel for updating car details.

SettingsPage.pageDescription: Manage your preferences and customize your experience
SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.description: Manage your preferences and customize your experience

ErrorPage.pageDescription: An error occurred while processing your request.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: The page you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

403.title: Access Forbidden
403.description: You do not have permission to access this page.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.description: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

502.title: Bad Gateway
502.description: The server returned an invalid response. Please try again later.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.description: The server is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

default.title: Something Went Wrong
default.description: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
